response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and innovation. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe it's worth more than $12,000 to us. Considering the value it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive opportunity for you to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $15,000. This is an exceptional chance to secure a piece that could potentially increase in value over time and serve as a significant addition to your collection or business. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 15000}
